summary: Sick of your gloves clipping through your robes? This mod removes the wrist part of the glove, so the gloves don\'t stick out.
descriptionHtml:
[center]BETTER FITTING GLOVES[/center]

[color=red]VERSION 1.3 AVAILABLE[/color]
Now added a non clipping version of Volek\'s Mystic gloves. In order for mod to work must download his file first (In order to get the .esp file)

1.2
Fixed world object appearance, should just look like regular gloves now.


FUTURE PROJECTS
------------------
Fingerless gloves! (you know you want them)
Editing Volek\'s [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4357]Mystic Gloves[/url] [color=green]Done![/color]


Haha 1000 downloads? No way XD

Info
--------------
Mages have a limited choice in hand gear if they want the clothing bonus, and basically the only pair of gloves in the game clip through the robes. What i did was make the back part of the gloves transparent so there is no more clipping. The gloves surprisingly also look pretty decent with short sleeves, but then again who wears short sleeves in Skyrim.

Programs Used
----------------------
GIMP
NifSkope

Installation
----------------
Download file and drop it into your skyrim folder!

Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim

Uninstall
------------------
Go into the texture and meshes folders, go to clothes and delete \"farmersclothes03\" in each folder. If you have farmer textures you want to keep, then go into the farmer folder and only delete the gloves.

Special thanks
------------------------------
 Bethesda for creating the game
QuickFox for telling me how to make meshes and textures transparent


Bugs
----------
If not wearing sleeves, the male version of the gloves will show a big hole in your wrist, if you know how to fix please message me how to :)
Report them if you find them.
This mod may interfere with other glove texture/mesh mods.

If you take better pictures than mine post them!
author: Feather Grey
